get.description:
Returns a list of all resource contents belonging to the resource
with the given ID, associated to locations that are children of the parent location
with the given ID.

As the resulting list may contain contents of arbitrary type, the
returned content objects cannot be typed to their precise resource content type.

parameters.name: res

schema.description: ID of resource the requested contents belong to
schema.title: Res

parameters.description: ID of resource the requested contents belong to

parameters.name: parent

schema.description: ID of location for which siblings to get contents for
schema.title: Parent

parameters.description: ID of location for which siblings to get contents for

schema.title: Response Get Content Siblings Browse Content Siblings Get

get.description:
Returns the location path from the location with the given level/position
as the last element, up to its most distant ancestor location
on structure level 0 as the first element of an array as well as all contents
for the given resource(s) referencing the locations in the location path.

parameters.name: txt

schema.description: ID of text to look up data for

schema.description: Location position

schema.description: Only return contents for the head location of the path

schema.description: Return at most <limit> contents

parameters.description: Return at most <limit> contents

get.description:
Finds the nearest location the given resource holds content for and returns
its position index or -1 if no content was found.

parameters.description: Location position

parameters.name: res

schema.description: ID of resource to return nearest location with content for

schema.description: Whether to look for the nearest preceding or subsequent location with content
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Whether to look for the nearest preceding or subsequent location with content

get.summary: Get path options by head id
get.description:
Returns the options for selecting text locations derived from the location path of
the location with the given ID as head.

schema.title: Response Get Path Options By Head Id Browse Locations  Id  Path Options By Head Get

get.description:
Returns the options for selecting text locations derived from the location path of
the location with the given ID as root. At each level, the first option is taken
as the basis for the next level.

schema.title: Response Get Path Options By Root Browse Locations  Id  Path Options By Root Get

get.description:
Returns a list of all resource contents matching the given criteria.

Respects restricted resources and inactive texts.
As the resulting list may contain contents of different types, the
returned content objects cannot be typed to their precise resource content type.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Return at most <limit> items
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Return at most <limit> items

Deletes the specified location. Also deletes any associated contents,
child locations and contents associated with child locations.

get.description:
Returns a list of public users matching the given query.

Only returns active user accounts. The query is considered to match a full token
(e.g. first name, last name, username, a word in the affiliation field).

schema.description: Query string to search in user data
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Query string to search in user data
